character.name: Dax Stargazer
character.abilities: Four arms, compound eyes, natural technical aptitude, cave-dwelling evolution

world_context.setting: Milky Way galaxy, human space expansion era
world_context.ftl_travel: Exists but expensive, takes days/weeks between systems
world_context.government: United Earth controls inner planets, corporations dominate outer systems
world_context.alien_species: About a dozen known sapient species, peaceful trade relations

events.details: Scanned U.E.S. Wanderer's cargo containers, found Weyland Biosystems manufacturing tags embedded in shipping codes for supposed 'archaeological specimens' from LV-426
events.key_npcs: Captain Morrison (shocked by revelation), Dr. Yuen (assists with investigation)
events.outcome: Dax and Dr. Yuen create memory lock (code 5-5-3-7) to hide knowledge from potential interrogation

events.details: Ship's klaxon blaring, emergency power only, memory gaps present

rolls.intelligence_technology: 20 (success) - Bypassed damaged terminal, accessed ship schematics

key_discoveries: Ship identified as U.E.S. Wanderer - Long-Range Exploration Vessel
Security cam feed shows Corridor Gamma-7 covered in dark, web-like substance

creature_details.name: Gloom Skitterer
creature_details.description: Dog-sized, four serrated insectoid legs, two scythe-like front limbs, eyeless head with twitching antennae, glistening black carapace
creature_details.abilities: Hunts by sound, vulnerable to heat and light, can project web substance

combat_tactics: Dax uses medical scanner as improvised laser pointer to lure creature
Successfully leads Skitterer into Med Bay using blue light distraction
Stealth roll: 22 (critical success) - perfect silent movement past creature

datapad_bomb.method: Puncture battery at precise angle for thermal discharge

events.description: Repairs ship's reactor using Plasma Injector
key_discoveries: Plasma Injector shattered, caused power surge and fire in Gamma-7
Ship salvageable with spare injector from storage bay
6 of 8 escape pods fully charged and ready (launch controls on Bridge only)
Cryo-purge option available (would destroy reactor but neutralize biological threats)

chen.background: 3 years on Wanderer, worked up from junior engineer, Mars colony origin
chen.status: Injured (dislocated shoulder), survived in storage bay
chen.key_quote: Martinez was military, and even he...

creature_details.name: The Amalgamation
creature_details.description: 3 meters tall, writhing mass of absorbed human flesh and materials, dozens of randomly blinking eyes, mouths where none should be
creature_details.abilities: Growing/spreading, absorbing materials and organic matter, acidic touch (melts metal doors)
creature_details.origin: Fusion of infected crew members and ship materials

events.tactical_outcome: Successful spacing of creature through hull breach, emergency bulkheads contained damage

captain_morrison.status: Dying from internal bleeding, maintained quarantine until end
captain_morrison.key_actions: Kept quarantine protocols active, prepped escape pods, refused medical aid

dr_yuen.full_name: Dr. Yuen (later revealed as Dr. Sarah Yuen)
dr_yuen.status: Rescued from Medical Bay, injured but stable
dr_yuen.key_revelation: Had placed memory lock on Dax 3 weeks prior

events.escape_method: Improvised ammunition detonation as distraction, escape pods launched to Titan Station
events.final_weapon: 8-round ammunition clip + multi-tool jury-rigged as delayed explosive

events.description: Survivors processed and placed in protective custody

director_holbrook.background: 12 years running station, dislikes Weyland influence
director_holbrook.authority: Independent station control, not corporate puppet

kellerman.description: Mid-40s, sharp features, predator's smile, expensive suit

station_politics.weyland_presence: 300 employees, mid-ring offices, significant but not dominant influence
station_politics.corporate_structure: Multiple companies (Sakura Industries largest, Kepler Mining, Weyland Biosystems)
station_politics.station_independence: Director maintains control, corporations are tenants not rulers

events.description: Memory lock broken, full truth revealed to Director Holbrook

memory_restoration.revealed_memories: Cargo containers were Weyland bioweapons with manufacturer tags, Captain Morrison was deceived, memory lock was insurance policy

evidence_presented: Dax's recovered memories of pre-incident investigation

kellerman_tactics.bribery_offer: 250,000 Universal Credits each + passage anywhere + medical coverage
kellerman_tactics.threats: Paint survivors as unreliable due to trauma, pursue criminal negligence against Dr. Yuen
kellerman_tactics.leverage_attempts: Memory anomaly makes Dax unreliable witness, Chen easily replaceable, Yuen has medical license vulnerability

events.director_response: Protocol Seven activated - all Weyland assets frozen, survivors under station protection

events.description: Discovery of corporate espionage and escalation

threat_escalation.discovery_method: Dax's Vexian sensitivity to structural vibrations (Perception 18)

osprey_security.methods: 48-hour resolution window, escalate from pressure to direct action
osprey_security.current_threat: Two-person cell, one visible (Kellerman contact), one hidden extraction specialist

weapons_and_tactics.ammunition: Started with unknown rounds, acquired 8-round spare magazine
weapons_and_tactics.usage: Limited effectiveness against creatures, primarily for sound/distraction

creatures_encountered.name: Gloom Skitterer
creatures_encountered.appearance: Black chitinous carapace, four serrated legs, two scythe limbs, eyeless with antennae
creatures_encountered.scan_results: Medical scanner confirmed engineered bioweapon markers

creatures_encountered.name: Infected Crew
creatures_encountered.appearance: Human crew with fungal growths on neck/arms, milky eyes
creatures_encountered.scan_results: Fungal patterns match known weapon strains

creatures_encountered.name: The Amalgamation
creatures_encountered.appearance: Fused human/material mass, multiple eyes and mouths
creatures_encountered.origin: Infected crew members fused with ship materials

key_locations.name: Titan Station
key_locations.type: Neutral trading station in Saturn orbit
key_locations.security_features: Section A diplomatic quarters, Protocol Seven lockdown capability

major_discoveries.implications: Deliberate biological warfare disguised as archaeological transport

major_discoveries.method: Neurological trigger placed by Dr. Yuen

major_discoveries.revelation: Listed as Cargo Specialist, not just ship's doctor
major_discoveries.responsibility: Signed off on containers, was deceived by false manifests

dice_rolls_record.context: Silent movement past maintenance tunnel drip
Convincing Director Holbrook to act against Weyland
Reading Dr. Yuen's desperate message for authenticity
Detecting Osprey surveillance drone in ventilation
Recalling Osprey Security Solutions background and methods

character_relationships.background: Mars colony engineer, sends money to brother in technical school
character_relationships.status: Committed to team, shared resources agreement

character_relationships.personality: Methodical, guilt-ridden about cargo approval, intelligent
character_relationships.status: Revealed dual role, committed to justice for Morrison

character_relationships.name: Director Holbrook
character_relationships.capabilities: Station-wide authority, legal protection, investigation resources

character_relationships.name: Captain Morrison
character_relationships.legacy: Inspiration for survivors to seek justice

current_status.protection_level: Station diplomatic protection under Protocol Seven
current_status.resources: 15,000 Universal Credits combined, survivor benefits pending, station protection
current_status.evidence_status: Martinez data log secured, medical scans preserved, memory lock testimony documented
